attributes.action: Driving licence points for any offences
attributes.additional_details:
A good way to stop criminals getting about is to take their licence away from them.

Rather than just giving out points on a driving licence for road traffic offences, my suggestion is to have them for any offence involving a motor-vehicle. Being mindful a driving licence is a privilege not a right.

For example a drug dealer or a burglar using a motor-vehicle to assist them in committing their crime should get points added to their licence. Eventually having it removed from persistent offenders and disrupting their criminal ways.
